snippet.title: Atari Lynx Longplay - Zarlor Mercenary (OLD)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

An interesting shootemup. It certainly a well made lynx game and takes some inspiration from Xenon II's weapon shop.  You can play with different characters which also come with different ship abilities which gives the game replay value.  The game certainly gets very challenging in later levels.  Hard to imagine how dodging all that bullet fire would be possible on the actual hardware with the blury ole lcd. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
